resources.string: Enter the IP address of the server

This application plays the audio that is being streamed from the server. Make sure the server is turned ON and is waiting for the connection from the clients.

Connect
On startup of the application, enter the IP address of the server and click on Connect button.

The background color turns green, if the connection is successful, and the audio starts playing.

If the connection fails, the background remains red.

Disconnect
Press the Disconnect button to disconnect from the server and stop streaming.

Reasons for failure
The connection may fail due to invalid IP address or if the connection cannot be established.
